content: Render a vast subterranean geode cavern in photoreal detail.
Primary subject: a large amethyst geode cluster emitting soft violet light; secondary: a faint waterfall in the distance reflecting purple hues.
Introduce subtle surreal motifs: gently drifting refracted light prisms and bioluminescent insects, swirling wisps of mist that hint at ordered light paths.
Apply editorial-retro cues: vintage grading (deep purples), soft film grain, subtle chromatic aberration; maintain clean composition and negative space.
Color discipline: dominant #4A148C and #8E24AA; accents #E040FB and #A1887F; backgrounds and neutrals from #0D0D19/#1D162B/#291F38/#9C8EA3; avoid neon oversaturation.
Composition: wide shot, eye-level, rule of thirds with clear focal hierarchy; geometric order in crystal arrays to evoke layered perspectives.
prompt.negative: chaos, blur, cartoonish, neon oversaturation, cliché holograms, heavy distortion, low-res text
